name: Slidey Tanks
description:
Slidey Tanks is a game where players use the recoil of their shots to move around varying levels. In this multiplayer tactical shooter, you will have to make sure to use your shots in the most effective way possible to dodge incoming enemy fire, and traverse around the different environments available to play on.

Controls

In the current build of the game, only 2 player multiplayer is available. One using a Mouse and Keyboard, and the other using an Xbox Controller Connected to the PC.

Player 1 (Blue) Controls:

A,D : Rotate Tank Body

Mouse Pointer : Aim Barrel

Left Mouse Click : Shoot Gun

Player 2 (Red) Controls:

Left Joystick : Rotate Tank Body

Right Joystick : Aim Barrel

RT : Fire Gun

I have a developer video/trailer on the way. However, if you have played this game in a video, please make sure to send it to me!

Please note that Slidey Tanks is currently in Pre-Alpha. Please feel free to get in contact with me over Twitter or through the comments section of this post if you have any troubles/recommendations for this project!

You can track it's development both on my Blog and Trello.

Slidey Tanks is being developed in Unity3D, as part of the AINT254 - Interactive Systems Module, a 12 week module at Plymouth University.
